articles.title: Thorgan Hazard screamer eliminates Portugal, books Italy quarter-final clash - The World Game
articles.description: Belgium ended Portugal's European Championship defence with a 1-0 win in Seville, despite losing Kevin De Bruyne and Eden Hazard to injuries in the last-16 clash.
articles.content:
With both sides facing a daunting route to Euro 2020 glory, it was Belgium who emerged to reach a quarter-final tie against in-form Italy thanks to Thorgan Hazard's long-range strike.
It was a goal … [+2548 chars]
